title: What do you think when you are music? - Quora

response.answer_text: Dude, the question was written wrongly. "What do you think when you are music?" I DON'T KNOW IT DEPENDS CAUSE THAT FUDGIN' COMPOSER HAD TO PUT IN FIFTEEN RESTS AT THE START OF A 4/4 BEAT SONG WITH MY PART BEING LESS THAN TWO LINES SO I'M JUST LIKE I'MMA SLEEP FIRST THEN SURPRISE THEM BROADWAY MOTHERFUDGERS WITH MY BANSHEE INSPIRED HOLDING NOTE so yeah, it depends

Im sure youre meaning “What do you think WHILE youre listening to music?” and if thats the case, than it's very simple. It all varies on what's on my mind. Some days i have a lot of aggression, so when i listen to certain songs i just imagine myself going on a psychotic rage. Other days if i am sad, i play a little bit more slow songs. And i envision myself doing past memories differently. Music has a power of the mind a lot of the time and can put people in a “different world” temporarily.
